name: Don't Crash! (itch)
description:
Pilot a super charged ship through a never ending plane of obstacles!

Wait! But why are you flying a ship through a meadow? We don't know why are you?

All we know is that there's only one rule; DON'T CRASH!

Made for the GAMES MADE QUICK??? 1½ Game Jam

Controls

Action
Primary Key
Secondary Key
Left Lane
←ARight Lane
→DCenter Lane
[Release Directional Key]
Fire Weapon
Space
Pause/ResumeEsc

Items

ItemEffectStarBonus Points
BoltShield + Temporary Speed Boost
ShieldTemporary Shield
Dash Arrows
Short Burst of Speed

P.S. Every once in awhile after you have collected enough points the boss will show up. Then the game will get slightly more difficult after defeating him.

[Android version is here!]
